## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G41080](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G41080)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtGDPD2, GDPD2</u>
- **Gene Name:** glycerophosphodiester phosphodiesterase 2
- **Description:**   PLC-like phosphodiesterases superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
